name: 34_Customer_Segmentation_KMeans_CustomerSegmentation_ML
query: I need to create a customer segmentation system using the K-means clustering algorithm with the Kaggle Customer Segmentation dataset. Start by standardizing the data in `src/data_loader.py`, then use the elbow method to determine the optimal number of clusters and save the elbow plot to `results/figures/elbow.jpg`. Implement the K-means algorithm in `src/model.py`. Save the cluster centers in `results/metrics/cluster_centers.txt`. Visualize the segmentation results using seaborn and save the plot as `results/figures/customer_segmentation.png`. Create an interactive Dash dashboard allowing dynamic exploration of the segments.

requirements.criteria: The "Kaggle Customer Segmentation" dataset is used, including data loading and preparation in `src/data_loader.py`.
Data is standardized to ensure feature values are within the same range in `src/data_loader.py`.
The elbow method is used to determine the optimal number of clusters. Please save the elbow plot to `results/figures/elbow.jpg`.
The K-means clustering algorithm is implemented in `src/model.py`.
The Customer segmentation is visualized using "seaborn," with the plot saved as `results/figures/customer_segmentation.png`.
An interactive dashboard which allows dynamic exploration of the segments is created using "Dash".

preferences.criteria: The elbow plot clearly shows how the optimal number of clusters is determined.
The system properly manages the launch and termination of the dashboard.
